name: Pakoman
description:
Pakoman

Video game for the 8-bit Atari 2600 console created in the year of 1998 and updated in 2018. Designed and published by NAS (Nova32 Animation Studios). You can download it from the itch.io store to play it on the Stella emulator version 5.1.3. It is possible to study its source code and learn to program for the 8-bit system with the book "Programación de Videojuegos Atari 2600" written by Rolando Fernández Benavidez in 2016. Available on Google Play Books digital and printed format.
